data.comment: Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Oliver Batista Meier.
In the minute 29, Heerenveen have been given a penalty at Fortuna Sittard Stadion...
Heerenveen are going well in Sittard-Geleen. They now lead 0-2 thanks to a Joey Veerman penalty.
It's now 0-3 in Sittard-Geleen as Henk Veerman scores for Heerenveen.
In the minute 34, That's a fine assist from Arjen Van Der Heide.
Marc Nagtegaal blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
In the minute 46, Sittard make their first substitution with Lisandro Semedo replacing Emil Hansson.
Tesfaldet Tekie is replacing Ben Rienstra for Sittard at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Sittard's Roel Janssen has been booked in Sittard-Geleen.
In the minute 69, Branislav Ninaj (Sittard) has received a yellow card from Marc Nagtegaal.
Rami Hajal is replacing Oliver Batista Meier for the away team.
George Cox for Sittard has been booked by Marc Nagtegaal and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, Sebastian Polter (Sittard) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-3.
Great play from Lisandro Semedo to set up the goal.
At Fortuna Sittard Stadion, Zian Flemming has been yellow-carded for the home team.
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team have replaced Arjen Van Der Heide with Couhaib Driouech. This is the second substitution made today by Johnny Jansen.
